turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello there, how can I help?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok you would like to order coffee from starbucks in new york is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Specifically Actually not, I said the wrong one. I'm at the Mid-Hudson Center one in Poughkeepsie, New York.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks at the Mid Hudson Center.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so a store close to mid hudson center in new york is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was wanting a grande iced latte macchiato with whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: grande iced latte macchiato with whole milk is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok got it, no additional flavoring, let me find the store closes to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok we have a starbucks inside target at 1 N Galleria Dr is that ok for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, one moment while i confirm your order for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so thats 1 grande iced latte macchiato with whole milk with no additional flavoring to be picked up at a starbucks inside target at 1 N Galleria Dr.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your drink has been ordered at the store and will be ready for pickup shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it. Thank you. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.
